channel.title: Causal Inference on Junyi Zhou
channel.description: Recent content in Causal Inference on Junyi Zhou

item.title: Meta-Learners (working)
item.description: Meta-learners for treatment effect estimation & optimal treatment recommendation under multiple treatment setting Treatment Effect Estimation Q-learning A-learning Treatment recommendation ITR (working) References A corresponding Meta-learner R-package can be found on Github by the same author. Meta-learners for treatment effect estimation & optimal treatment recommendation under multiple treatment setting Meta-learners are a simple way to leverage off-the-shelf predictive machine learning methods to estimate CATE/HTE/ITE.

item.title: Review of Causal Inference: An Overview
item.description: Brief Introduction Potential Outcome Framework A Big Picture of Causal Inference Causal Estimands Average Treatment Effect (ATE) Randomized Controlled Experiments Observational Studies Matching(subclassification/coarsened) Inverse Probability Weighting (IPW) Augmented Inverse Probability Weighting (AIPW) Covariate Balancing Propensity Score (CBPS) TMLE General Framework of ATE Estiamtion Process ConditionalAverage Treatment Effect (CATE) Randomized Experiments Interaction-oriented Methods Observational Studies Q-learning A-learning Individualized Treatment Rule Other tree-based methods Appendix Proof of IPW Proof of AIPW References Brief Introduction The need for causal inference arises in many different fields.

item.title: Review of Causal Inference: Heterogeneous Treatment Effect Estimation (old version)
item.description: Notice: the causal inference described here follows the idea of Potential Outcome Framework (Neyman 1923; Rubin 1974). For another big camp of causal inference studies, i.e., Structural Causal Model (SCM) (Pearl 2009), please refer to this well-written paper here. Heterogeneous Treatment Effect Estimation 1. Introduction The need for causal inference arises in many different fields. Economists want to quantify the causal effects of interest rate cut on the economy.
